title: Blood Press. & Cholesterol | 2 of 2
question_text: High BP (HBP) Normal BP (NBP) High Cholesterol (HC) 13 11 Normal Cholesterol (NC) 8 21 The two-way table above summarizes data about the occurrences of two medical measurements, blood pressure (BP) and cholesterol level, for $53$ individuals who were measured at the infirmary of a large steel mill as part of their annual check-up. Which of the following Venn diagrams is an accurate display of the data if the circles represent normal blood pressure and normal cholesterol?
